name: OTTSuggester-TheStreamingGuide
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the streaming guide
des: The skill is backed with strong suggester Algorithms and Engine. You can ask Alexa, open the streaming guide and get started. The Skill is pretty basic to play with and get a show name to watch for this Saturday Night.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
